ai-tha-ap352:1.2_0: Then at that time the rotten mountain,
ai-tha-ap352:1.4_0: I was drunken on the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap352:2.1_0: like the mouth of a drum on the mouth.
ai-tha-ap352:2.3_0: like the sun shining in the sick,
ai-tha-ap352:2.4_0: after praying each other with joined palms:
ai-tha-ap352:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap352:3.2_0: yet I am reborn among the mendicants
ai-tha-ap352:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap352:3.4_0: this is the ointment box with joined palms.
ai-tha-ap352:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Village.
ai-tha-ap352:6.1_0: and for the tenth Elder Nun Play homage.
ai-tha-ap352:7.1_0: The fifth sub-chapter on even one side is finished.
ai-tha-ap352:9.4_0: At the sesame seeds with joined palms:
